entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who writes for the Daily Prophet.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's pure-blood status is questioned by Rita Skeeter.

entities.name: fridwulfa
entities.description: Fridwulfa is Hagrid's mother and a giantess.

entities.name: he-who-must-not-be-named
entities.description: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is a dark wizard who killed many Muggles during his reign of terror.

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: Aurors are wizards who work against the Dark Side.

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter accuses Hagrid of not being a pure-blood wizard.
The Daily Prophet exposes Hagrid's true parentage.
He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named allied with the remaining giants.
